name: Bomber Mission
overview: Tally-Ho chaps! Bandits at three o'clock, bombs away!". Well - perhaps not, and anyway, a handlebar moustache would only get tangled up in the joystick cable. The idea in Bomber Mission is to take off in your fighter-bomber, fly to a pre-selected enemy location and wreak havoc and destruction by dropping your pre-selected payload on them. Be warned though, this isn't a flight simulator. There's no runway display.
